name: Peakaboo
description:
You need to make it to your car so you can get to your daughters soccer practice!

Made for the 

PB Game Jam 4 : Sneaky

But was unable to submit it because the submissions ended 1 second before I could make it to them.

I plan to update this with new levels regularly.

Controls:

W = jump

A = left 

S = crouch

D = right

SPACE = hide
